name: Bounce To Infinity
description:
Can you reach the infinity?  Keep bouncing and aim for the highest!

Bounce To Infinity is a perfect mini game when you have some time to kill.

Experience a procedurally-generated platformer game with several unique platforms and patterns.

Collect relics along the way that help you achieve higher scores. There's a surprise when you collect all relics!

Too difficult? Don't give up! Life is a challenge.

I'm open to ideas & criticisms for further development & updates of the game. Be sure to leave a comment if you like my work and want to see more!

*Note: This App is developed for iPhones*

And here is my cat. Have a nice day!
